ISSF Road Rehabilitation – East Leg Project - setOpen Tender
=====================================

Introduction
------------

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites interested bidders to submit a proposal for the ISSF Road Rehabilitation – East Leg project. The project involves rehabilitating the east leg portion of NRCan’s Inuvik Satellite Station Facility (ISSF) existing road network.

Project Description
-----------------

The project will be delivered via a design-bid-build approach. The work includes, but is not limited to, surveying, construction access development, clearing and brushing of vegetation, excavation of existing road embankment, and supply/haul/placement/compaction of embankment/sub-base/surfacing gravel.

Important Dates
----------------

*   Tender closing date: October 4, 2022 at 16:00 hours
*   Project delivery date: 5 weeks from the date of notification of acceptance of the offer

Trade Agreement
---------------

This project is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

Evaluation Criteria
-------------------

Bidders will be evaluated based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

Definitions
------------

For the purpose of this tender, the following definitions apply:

*   ISSF: Inuvik Satellite Station Facility
*   NRCan: Natural Resources Canada
*   CFTA: Canadian Free Trade Agreement

Availability of Documents
-------------------------

Bid documents, including specifications and drawings, are available on Merx (government electronic tendering service) or through the Government of Canada tendering service at [www.buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders](http://buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders).

 Submission of Proposals
------------------------

To ensure timely evaluation, bidders are required to submit their proposals electronically through Mercx or by email to the contracting authority. Late submissions will not be accepted.

Contact
-------

For all inquiries of a technical and contractual nature, please contact:

Vinay Singh
PWGSC Procurement Specialist
Phone:  587-341-8025
Fax: 1-418-566-6167
Email: [vinay.singh@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca](mailto:vinay.singh@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca)

Inquiries are to be made in writing and should be received no less than five (5) calendar days prior to the closing date to allow sufficient time for the contracting authority to respond.
